net.canarymod.api.world.blocks

Interface BlockMaterial


  • public interface BlockMaterial
    Block Material

    Contains technical information about a Block

    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBurn()
      Checks if the material is burnable
      boolean canPreventGrassGrowth()
      Checks if the material is placed on dirt/grass, will prevent grass growth and kill current grass
      int getMobility()
      Returns the mobility information of the material, 0 = free, 1 = can't push but can move over, 2 = total immobility and stop pistons.
      boolean isAlwaysHarvested()
      Checks to see if the material can be harvested it in any case.
      boolean isLiquid()
      Checks if the material is liquid.
      boolean isOpaque()
      Indicate if the material is opaque
      boolean isReplaceable()
      Checks if the material can be replaced with other blocks placed (ie: tall grass, snow, water, lava)
      boolean isSolid()
      Checks if the material is solid.
      boolean isTranslucent()
      Indicates if the material is translucent
      boolean noToolRequired()
      Determines if the material can be harvested without a tool (or with the wrong tool)

    • Method Detail

      • isLiquid

        boolean isLiquid()
        Checks if the material is liquid.
        Returns:
        true if liquid; false otherwise

      • isSolid

        boolean isSolid()
        Checks if the material is solid.
        Returns:
        true if solid; false otherwise

      • canPreventGrassGrowth

        boolean canPreventGrassGrowth()
        Checks if the material is placed on dirt/grass, will prevent grass growth and kill current grass
        Returns:
        true if prevents; false otherwise

      • canBurn

        boolean canBurn()
        Checks if the material is burnable
        Returns:
        true if burns; false otherwise

      • isReplaceable

        boolean isReplaceable()
        Checks if the material can be replaced with other blocks placed (ie: tall grass, snow, water, lava)
        Returns:
        true if replaceable; false otherwise

      • isOpaque

        boolean isOpaque()
        Indicate if the material is opaque
        Returns:
        true if opaque; false otherwise

      • noToolRequired

        boolean noToolRequired()
        Determines if the material can be harvested without a tool (or with the wrong tool)
        Returns:
        true if no tool required; false otherwise

      • getMobility

        int getMobility()
        Returns the mobility information of the material, 0 = free, 1 = can't push but can move over, 2 = total immobility and stop pistons.
        Returns:
        0 = free, 1 = can't push but can move over, 2 = no movement

      • isAlwaysHarvested

        boolean isAlwaysHarvested()
        Checks to see if the material can be harvested it in any case.
        Returns:
        true if always; flase if not

      • isTranslucent

        boolean isTranslucent()
        Indicates if the material is translucent
        Returns:
        true if translucent; false otherwise
